languages.text: "Крударах нельзя описать на вашем языке. Его можно только спеть — облачить в вязь мелодии, изящной и сложной, как его энергетическая сеть, {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Контур бесконечности{/g}. Его можно увидеть в золотых переливах солнца, ощутить в дуновении звездных ветров. Хоть он и был миром рукотворным, но столь же живым, как настоящие планеты".

traits.locale_text: "Крударах нельзя описать на вашем языке. Его можно только спеть — облачить в вязь мелодии, изящной и сложной, как его энергетическая сеть, {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Контур бесконечности{/g}. Его можно увидеть в золотых переливах солнца, ощутить в дуновении звездных ветров. Хоть он и был миром рукотворным, но столь же живым, как настоящие планеты".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Crudarach cannot be described in your language. It can only be sung — encased in a filigree of sounds, a melody as complex and delicate as the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g}, its energy network. It can be seen in the golden hues of sunlight, felt in the breath of celestial winds. Though it was an artificial world, it was just as alive as any real planet."
languages.original_text: "Крударах нельзя описать на вашем языке. Его можно только спеть — облачить в вязь мелодии, изящной и сложной, как его энергетическая сеть, {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Контур бесконечности{/g}. Его можно увидеть в золотых переливах солнца, ощутить в дуновении звездных ветров. Хоть он и был миром рукотворным, но столь же живым, как настоящие планеты".

traits.locale_text: "Crudarach cannot be described in your language. It can only be sung — encased in a filigree of sounds, a melody just as complex and delicate as the Eternal cycle, it's energy network. It can be seen in the golden hues of sunlight, felt in the breath of celestial winds. It was alive in the same way real planets are despite being an artificial world."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “克鲁达拉赫无法用你们的语言描述。它只能被颂唱出来，包裹在音律的细丝中，与它的能量网络{g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}永恒回路{/g}一样，奏着复杂而精妙的旋律。你可以在金色的阳光中看到它，在风的呼吸中感受到它。尽管它是被制造出来的世界，但它与真正的行星一样，充满了生命力。”
languages.original_text: "Crudarach cannot be described in your language. It can only be sung — encased in a filigree of sounds, a melody as complex and delicate as the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g}, its energy network. It can be seen in the golden hues of sunlight, felt in the breath of celestial winds. Though it was an artificial world, it was just as alive as any real planet."

traits.locale_text: “克鲁达拉赫无法用你们的语言描述。它只能被颂唱出来，包裹在音律的细丝中，与它的能量网络{g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}永恒回路{/g}一样，奏着复杂而精妙的旋律。你可以在金色的阳光中看到它，在风的呼吸中感受到它。尽管它是被制造出来的世界，但它与真正的行星一样，充满了生命力。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Crudarach cannot be described in your language. It can only be sung — encased in a filigree of sounds, a melody as complex and delicate as the Infinity Circuit, its energy network. It can be seen in the golden hues of sunlight, felt in the breath of celestial winds. Though it was an artificial world, it was just as alive as any real planet."

languages.text: «Crudarach no puede describirse en tu idioma. Solo se puede cantar, recubierto de una filigrana de sonidos, una melodía tan compleja y delicada como el {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Circuito Infinito{/g}, su red de energía. Puede verse en los tonos dorados de la luz del sol, sentirse en el aliento de los vientos celestiales. A pesar de ser un mundo artificial, estaba tan vivo como cualquier planeta natural».
languages.original_text: "Crudarach cannot be described in your language. It can only be sung — encased in a filigree of sounds, a melody as complex and delicate as the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g}, its energy network. It can be seen in the golden hues of sunlight, felt in the breath of celestial winds. Though it was an artificial world, it was just as alive as any real planet."

traits.locale_text: «Crudarach no puede describirse en tu idioma. Solo se puede cantar, recubierto de una filigrana de sonidos, una melodía tan compleja y delicada como el {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Circuito Infinito{/g}, su red de energía. Puede verse en los tonos dorados de la luz del sol, sentirse en el aliento de los vientos celestiales. A pesar de ser un mundo artificial, estaba tan vivo como cualquier planeta natural».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「クルダラは言葉で表現することはできない。それはただ歌い継がれるだけだ。音の木立に包まれ、{g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}無限回路{/g}やそのエネルギー・ネットワークのように複雑で繊細なメロディーを奏でるのだ。それは太陽の光の黄金色に見ることができ、天空の風の息吹に感じることができる。人工的な世界ではあるが、現実の惑星と同じように生きているのだ」
languages.original_text: "Crudarach cannot be described in your language. It can only be sung — encased in a filigree of sounds, a melody as complex and delicate as the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g}, its energy network. It can be seen in the golden hues of sunlight, felt in the breath of celestial winds. Though it was an artificial world, it was just as alive as any real planet."

traits.locale_text: 「クルダラは言葉で表現することはできない。それはただ歌い継がれるだけだ。音の木立に包まれ、{g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}無限回路{/g}やそのエネルギー・ネットワークのように複雑で繊細なメロディーを奏でるのだ。それは太陽の光の黄金色に見ることができ、天空の風の息吹に感じることができる。人工的な世界ではあるが、現実の惑星と同じように生きているのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Crudarach lässt sich in Eurer Sprache nicht beschreiben. Es kann nur gesungen werden — eingebettet in ein Filigran aus Klängen, eine Melodie so komplex und delikat wie die {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Unendlichkeitsmatrix{/g}, sein Energienetzwerk. Man kann es in den goldenen Tönen des Sonnenlichts sehen, im Atem der himmlischen Winde spüren. Obgleich es eine künstliche Welt war, war es so lebendig wieder jeder echte Planet."
languages.original_text: "Crudarach cannot be described in your language. It can only be sung — encased in a filigree of sounds, a melody as complex and delicate as the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g}, its energy network. It can be seen in the golden hues of sunlight, felt in the breath of celestial winds. Though it was an artificial world, it was just as alive as any real planet."

traits.locale_text: "Crudarach lässt sich in Eurer Sprache nicht beschreiben. Es kann nur gesungen werden — eingebettet in ein Filigran aus Klängen, eine Melodie so komplex und delikat wie die {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Unendlichkeitsmatrix{/g}, sein Energienetzwerk. Man kann es in den goldenen Tönen des Sonnenlichts sehen, im Atem der himmlischen Winde spüren. Obgleich es eine künstliche Welt war, war es so lebendig wieder jeder echte Planet."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Il est impossible de décrire Crudarach dans votre langue. On ne peut que le chanter, avec un entrelacs de sons qui composent une mélodie aussi complexe et délicate que le {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Circuit d'Infinité{/g}, son réseau d'énergie. On peut le voir dans les nuances dorées des rayons de soleil, le sentir dans le souffle des vents célestes. Même s'il s'agissait d'un monde artificiel, il était aussi vivant qu'une planète. »
languages.original_text: "Crudarach cannot be described in your language. It can only be sung — encased in a filigree of sounds, a melody as complex and delicate as the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g}, its energy network. It can be seen in the golden hues of sunlight, felt in the breath of celestial winds. Though it was an artificial world, it was just as alive as any real planet."

traits.locale_text: « Il est impossible de décrire Crudarach dans votre langue. On ne peut que le chanter, avec un entrelacs de sons qui composent une mélodie aussi complexe et délicate que le {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Circuit d'Infinité{/g}, son réseau d'énergie. On peut le voir dans les nuances dorées des rayons de soleil, le sentir dans le souffle des vents célestes. Même s'il s'agissait d'un monde artificiel, il était aussi vivant qu'une planète. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Senin dilinde Crudarach'ı tasvir etmek mümkün değil, yalnızca şarkısı söylenebilir. Mücevher gibi işlenmiş seslerle, enerji ağı {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Ebedî Devre'yi{/g} andıran karmaşık ve narin bir melodiyle bezenen bir şarkı... Onu gün ışığının altın renklerinde görebilir, gökte esen rüzgârların üflemesinde hissedebilirsin. Yapay bir dünya olsa dahi hakiki bir gezegen misali canlıdır."
languages.original_text: "Crudarach cannot be described in your language. It can only be sung — encased in a filigree of sounds, a melody as complex and delicate as the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g}, its energy network. It can be seen in the golden hues of sunlight, felt in the breath of celestial winds. Though it was an artificial world, it was just as alive as any real planet."

traits.locale_text: "Senin dilinde Crudarach'ı tasvir etmek mümkün değil, yalnızca şarkısı söylenebilir. Mücevher gibi işlenmiş seslerle, enerji ağı {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Ebedî Devre{/g}'yi andıran karmaşık ve narin bir melodiyle bezenen bir şarkı... Onu gün ışığının altın renklerinde görebilir, gökte esen rüzgârların üflemesinde hissedebilirsin. Yapay bir dünya olsa dahi hakiki bir gezegen misali canlıdır."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
